original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1231)@</color>恢復我方全體 <color=#ccffcc>50%</color> 體力，並在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4720)@</color> 秒內每秒恢復武將 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(4720)@</color> 點體力，且士兵每秒恢復 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(4725)@</color> 點體力。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1231)@</color>Recover all of us <color=#ccffcc>100%</color> physical strength, and In <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4720)@</color> seconds, restore <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(4720)@</color> points of physical strength every second.
